description: This file defines a Fragment class 'VideoDetailsFragment' for an Android TV app, representing the video details screen. It includes UI logic for displaying video title/description, handling play/resume/favorite actions, and defining an interface for communication with the host activity.

classes.name: VideoDetailsFragment
classes.description: A Fragment displaying details of a video, with actions for play, resume, and favorite toggle. It interacts with external data stores and communicates with its host activity via the Host interface.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the fragment, extracting the Video argument from the arguments bundle.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the fragment's layout from XML.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Initializes UI components, sets up click and key listeners, and manages favorite state collection.

methods.name: formatTime
methods.description: Formats milliseconds into a mm:ss string.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.description: Creates a new instance of VideoDetailsFragment with the provided Video parameter.
